CustomField.description: True if the field can have multiple types of objects as parents. For example, a task can have both the Contact/Lead ID (WhoId) field and the Opportunity/Account ID (WhatId) field return true for this method. because either of those objects can be the parent of a particular task record. This method returns false otherwise

CustomField.label: Name Pointing
